meanings.definition: A chemical compound used as an insecticide.
meanings.sent1: The farmer sprayed dichlorvos on the crops to keep insects away.
meanings.sent2: Make sure to wear protective gear when handling dichlorvos in the garden.
meanings.sent3: The ants at the picnic were so scared of dichlorvos, they ran away!
meanings.sent4: The dichlorvos worked like a shield, protecting the plants from harmful bugs.
meanings.sent5: The smell of dichlorvos lingered in the air, a sign that the pests were gone.

meanings.definition: To treat with dichlorvos to eliminate pests.
meanings.sent1: The exterminator will dichlorvos the house to get rid of the termites.
meanings.sent2: Remember to properly ventilate the room after dichlorvosing it.
meanings.sent3: The pests in the garden were no match for the powerful dichlorvos treatment!
meanings.sent4: After dichlorvosing the area, the bugs vanished as if by magic.
meanings.sent5: She dichlorvosed the entire room, ensuring no pests would bother her again.
